snippet.title: Dead Containment - Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Dead Containment is an on-rails shooter inspired by classic arcade light gun games. Players fend off the undead as they race through a city under siege, blasting away the horrors that roam the streets. Play solo or with a friend over online play, collect hidden pickups to boost your score, show off your skills in the stats screen and prove to your friends why you would survive a zombie outbreak.

Features:
- Solo and Online Co-op
- Light gun support
- Boss fights
- Multiple paths
- A classic arcade experience

Visit the Dead Containment Steam page and download the demo today!

Steam - https://store.steampowered.com/app/1302230/Dead_Containment/
Twitter - https://twitter.com/grumpdoggames
